You'll have likely noticed this game has been review bombed heavily\, undeservedly I think.Other reviewers have pointed out that the characters and or story are badly written and would rate the game on that criticism alone a 0 or 1. I'm on the other end of the spectrum. I think the characters were completely believable in their actions and I think more than enough time was spend on showing where their motivation comes from.Even if you disagree with me on this after you complete the game\, that's okay\, this game is still a technical master piece. From the graphics\, amazing animations and facial expressions\, the controls and combat\, no other game before has executed this level of excellence before in my humble opinion (the last game to make me feel that was Red Dead Redemption 2).The atmosphere this game manages to bring on screen which supported by incredible sound design and voice acting is nothing short of amazing.Playing this game gave me an intense feeling of dread\, hope\, anger\, joy and peace.To describe The Last of Us Part II in one word: Intense… Expand
